description: Explore how your values align with your actions and choices

questions.text: What are your core values, and how do they show up in your daily life?
When do you feel most authentic and true to yourself?
What's one area of your life where you feel out of alignment with your values?
What action could you take today that would bring you closer to your ideal self?
How do you know when you're making decisions from fear versus love?
